title: Public EV Charger Site Selection
description: A business development manager needs to identify the best locations to install new public DC fast chargers.

tasks.description: Analyze traffic flow data and identify major commuter and travel corridors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent highlights three major highways as potential areas.

tasks.description: Identify locations with existing amenities like retail stores and restaurants along these corridors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a list of potential host sites (e.g., shopping centers).

tasks.description: Check grid capacity at the potential host sites to ensure they can support a bank of fast chargers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent filters the list to sites with sufficient grid power.

tasks.description: Rank the top 5 most promising sites based on a combined score of traffic, amenities, and grid access.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent delivers a prioritized list of target locations.
